mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.display_order AS displayOrder, c.is_active AS active, COALESCE(p.count, 0) AS productCount FROM category c LEFT JOIN (SELECT category_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM product GROUP BY category_id) p ON p.category_id = c.id ORDER BY c.display_order, c.name
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.display_order AS displayOrder, c.is_active AS active, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE category_id = c.id) AS productCount FROM category c WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.display_order AS displayOrder, c.is_active AS active, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE category_id = c.id) AS productCount FROM category c WHERE LOWER(c.name) = LOWER(#{name})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (name, display_order, is_active) VALUES (#{name}, #{displayOrder}, #{active})
